sentences.sContent: Initially the patterns I used were hieroglyph like symbols.
sentences.sContent_eng: Initially the patterns I used were hieroglyph like symbols.
sentences.sCn: 我所采用的图案是类似符号的象形文字。

sentences.sContent: In the Late Period, the hieroglyph of the bird was used to represent this deity directly.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the Late Period, the hieroglyph of the bird was used to represent this deity directly.
sentences.sCn: 在后来的时期内，鸟的象形文字直接用来表现神。

sentences.sContent: Initially the patterns I used were hieroglyph like symbols. After a holiday in the Maldives the "face" patterns developed. The local fishes gave me endless inspiration.
sentences.sContent_eng: Initially the patterns I used were hieroglyph like symbols. After a holiday in the Maldives the "face" patterns developed. The local fishes gave me endless inspiration.
sentences.sCn: 我所采用的图案是类似符号的象形文字。在马尔代夫度假后，这些“脸”的图形开始发展。那里的鱼类给了我无穷无尽的灵感。

synos.tran: 象形文字；图画文字；秘密符号

words.tran: 象形文字的；难解的（等于hieroglyphic）
象形文字；象形文字写的文章

trans.tranCn: 象形文字, 图画文字
trans.tranOther: a picture or symbol used to represent a word or part of a word, especially in the ancient Egyptian writing system
